p: Furthermore, it should be noted that, when ingested, M. spicata essential oil—due to its antioxidant, antiradical, and chelating properties—could contribute, with different mechanisms, to maintaining the balance of the organism’s redox status. Hence, the use of M. spicata and its essential oil as a seafood seasoning could be useful in improving the seafood product’s taste, safety, and effect on human health.
